News & Events

One solution to better care

Home
All
Blog
Events
News

Navigating Compliance in Healthcare: Solutions for Care Providers

Blog, News

Achieve and maintain full compliance with national regulations with care compliance software. Read more to find out how.

Learn more

We’re Finalists in the National Care Awards!

Events, News

OneTouch Health is delighted to announce we’ve been shortlisted as finalists in the National Care Awards!

Learn more
Register interest

Achieving Excellence in Domiciliary Care

Blog, News

Achieve excellence in domiciliary care provision with domiciliary care management software. Read more to find out how.

Learn more

Optimising Care Staff Scheduling with Advanced Software Solutions

Blog, News

Optimise your staff scheduling with advanced software solutions. Read more to find out how.

Learn more

The Future of Care: How Digital Care Plans Transform Outcomes

Blog, News

Digital care plans can help streamline your care planning and transform service users’ outcomes. Read more to find out how.

Learn more

Demonstrating Compliance for CQC Inspections with OneTouch

Blog, News

We can help to make your CQC inspections easier for you and your team. Read more to find out how.

Learn more

OneTouch Health are proud sponsors of Homecare’s Got Talent!

Blog, News

OneTouch Health is proud to be sponsoring Homecare’s Got Talent!

Learn more

OneTouch Health Group Acquires OnePlan to Bolster their Range of Care Management Solutions

Events, News
04 Jun 2024
Galway

We are delighted to welcome OnePlan to the OneTouch Health family. This is a strategic acquisition that aligns with our growth strategy.

Learn more
Register interest

OneTouch Health is exhibiting at the Leaders in Care Conference 2024

29 May 2024
London

OneTouch Health is exhibiting at the Leaders in Care Conference on the 29th of May!

Learn more

24 Jan 2024
London

We’re heading to the Care Show at Excel, London on the 24th and 25th April. Come see us at Stand K42.

News

We are proud to participate in the 10th annual National Workplace Wellbeing Day, an IBEC initiative.

Steve, Rachel and Kane have recently joined our sales and business development team.

We’re heading to the Care Show at Excel, London on the 24th and 25th April. Come see us at Stand K42.

Duane Lawrence appointed as Chair of the OneTouch Health Group Board

News

We welcome Duane Lawrences’ appointment as Chair of our Board of Directors.

Learn more

OneTouch is exhibiting at the Homecare Conference

News
24 Jan 2024
London

Our first event of 2024 is the Homecare Associations Future of Homecare Conference!

Learn more

Check us out in the latest edition of Homecare Insight

News

Richard, our Head of Strategy discusses how best to use tecnology in the care industry.

Learn more

We’re at the Cardiff Care Roadshow

Events, News
11 Nov 2023
Cardiff

We’re at another event and we’d love to see you there! Drop by Stand 28 and say hello.

Learn more
Register interest

We won another award!

News

Best Healthcare Software has a very nice ring to it! We’re delighted to add another trophy to the OneTouch cabinet.

Learn more

We are on the Deloitte Technology Fast 50 List

News

We are delighted to be named as one of Deloitte’s Fast 50 technology companies for 2023

Learn more

OneTouch is at the Care Association Alliance Conference.

News
24 Jan 2024
London

Our Head of Strategy spoke to the Yorkshire and the Humber Care Association Alliance conference attendees on how to use technology to enhance efficiency and reduce costs.

Learn more

We are the most Innovative Solution in Home Care

News

The OneTouch Team got dressed up and hit the red carpet for the leaders in Care Award show in Birmingham. The night was topped off when we won the award for the Most Innovative Solution in Home Care!

Learn more

We are delighted to announce our acquisition of AutumnCare

News

Exciting news as OneTouch acquires Australian based residential care software provider AutumnCare.
